name: Pong Evo
description:
Pong Evo is a new take on the father of all videogames.

You'll need a lot of precision and coordination to generate the laser paddle and keep the ball in the circle for one more bounce.

  • Play alone or with your friends on the same phone, and check your highscore with players around the world!
  • Accurate shots will increase your combo counter, increasing your score.
  • Once the counter is filled, you can double tap on the screen and slow down the ball.
  • Collectible bouncers are good points, but risky: be careful
